com.emitrom.flash4j.starling.client.animation

Class DelayedCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emitrom.flash4j.core.client.ProxyObject
      • com.emitrom.flash4j.starling.client.events.EventDispatcher
        • com.emitrom.flash4j.starling.client.animation.DelayedCall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAnimatable

    public class DelayedCall
extends EventDispatcher
implements IAnimatable
    A DelayedCall allows you to execute a method after a certain time has passed. Since it implements the IAnimatable interface, it can be added to a juggler. In most cases, you do not have to use peer class directly; the juggler class contains a method to delay calls directly.
